name: pokeiq
description: A Website that helps test the User's knowledge about Pokemon through Quizzes.

scripts.ci:all: npx concurrently "npm --prefix frontend ci" "npm --prefix backend ci" "npm --prefix config ci"
scripts.be:prisma:reset: npm run be:dotenv -- prisma migrate reset
scripts.be:prisma:migratedev: npm run be:dotenv -- prisma migrate dev
